original_text:
For all his rules were before me,
    and his statutes I did not put away from me.
korean_text: 그의 모든 규례가 내 앞에 있고 내게서 그의 율례를 버리지 아니하였음이로다

sentences.original_text: For all his rules were before me
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 규례가 내 앞에 있었으니

sentences.original_text: and his statutes I did not put away from me.
